Question: This person had permanent residences in Key West, Florida (1930s), and Cuba (1940s and 1950s).
Hints: His third son, Gregory Hancock ****, was born a year later on November 12, 1931 in Kansas City.
This person said he "was out of business as a writer" from 1942 to 1945.
This was the separation phase of a slow and painful split from Pauline, which had begun when this person met Martha.
